Servise.name: Physician Scheduling
Servise.describe: Use the latest technology to reduce the time of creating and maintaining schedules by up to 80%, while giving your team the work-life balance needed to best serve your patients.

Servise.name: Medical Staff Collaboration
Servise.describe: Physicians can update their information and communicate with colleagues via a secure messaging channel accessible from the on-calllists. Administrators and authorized staff have access to the most up-to-date contact information.

Servise.name: Patient On Call Synchronization
Servise.describe: On-Call centralizes and consolidates on-call Patient lists according to doctorsâ€™ clinical shifts and schedule, minimizing response times andcommunication errors. The result? Optimized patient security and quality of care.

Servise.name: Appointment Management System
Servise.describe: Give patients the opportunity to book an appointment on your website and sync the online portal with your EMR, reducing double booking.Manage and customize each physician availabilities on all booking channels.
